Mark Warner.name: Mark Warner
Mark Warner.policies: My policies prioritize bipartisan cooperation and harnessing technology for the betterment of our nation.

Marco Rubio.policies: My policies are aimed at advancing economic growth and strengthening America's role in the world.

James Risch.policies: My policies prioritize national security and economic prosperity for all Americans.

Susan Collins.policies: My policies focus on fostering bipartisanship and ensuring the voices of all constituents are heard.

Tom Cotton.policies: My policies center on bolstering military strength and upholding traditional American values.

John Cornyn.policies: My policies are rooted in conservative principles and aim to deliver effective legislative solutions for our nation.

Jerry Moran.policies: My policies advocate for constituent advocacy and the advancement of rural communities.

James Lankford.name: James Lankford
James Lankford.policies: My policies champion religious freedom and demand greater accountability in government.

Michael Rounds.name: Michael Rounds
Michael Rounds.policies: My policies center on fiscal conservatism and support policies benefiting agriculture and rural America.

Ron Wyden.name: Ron Wyden
Ron Wyden.policies: My policies prioritize progressive values and the protection of privacy rights for all citizens.

Martin Heinrich.name: Martin Heinrich
Martin Heinrich.policies: My policies are committed to environmental stewardship and advancing the rights of Native Americans.

Angus King.name: Angus King
Angus King.policies: My policies focus on independent leadership and pragmatic solutions to the challenges facing our nation.

Michael Bennet.policies: My policies center on education reform and creating economic opportunity for all Americans.

Robert Casey.policies: My policies are geared towards promoting social welfare and ensuring access to quality healthcare.

Kiristen Gillibrand.name: Kiristen Gillibrand
Kiristen Gillibrand.policies: My policies advocate for gender equality and the implementation of family-friendly policies.

Jon Ossoff.policies: My policies prioritize youth empowerment and fostering civic engagement in our communities.
